vignette.name: Inspecting Multiple Objects
vignette.bodytext: When you open the object inspector on multiple objects, only the attributes shared by the objects are shown.

ul.li: Select multiple objects in your patcher window by Shift-clicking or clicking and dragging an outline around the objects.
Click the Inspector button in the patcher toolbar.

If you have selected objects of different types, the inspector window will appear with the title multiple objects inspector. In most cases, this means only the common box attributes will appear in the inspector.
